post.body: Hahaha! Dude! He's like five feet tall! Maybe from a distance.. ;)
Makes sense when you put it like that...
Just heading home to see the folks right now... Still in the UK mind, can't imagine being overseas for Christmas.
Aww Wow! Cool! You must be both very happy... First Christmas with your youngest in Norway. Awesome. :)
Merry Christmas, where will you be singing 'Oh Tanenbaum' this year? :)
And to you Dude; a happy new year to you also.. :)
Good morning Sir and very Merry Christmas Eve to you too!
See ya soon lass, have a good one! :)
Have a good Christmas my friend. Looking forward to great things in the New Year. Take it easy man.
Passing through Waterloo in about ten mins.. En route to deepest darkest Essex.. Would love to drop by but I have too many bags!
You're in Norway too? Do you follow @renatenyborg? Maybe you should.. :)
Sounds like the last day of school.. :)
@inniemole @lewiswebb Great to see you're joining in with 'the spirit' of our New Year plans.. Eh heh.. ;D
I'm *pretty* sure I'm the ONLY person tweeting from Canvey Island right now...
RT @DaveConstable: @Whatleydude never actually realised, but you could double for Lee Adama. - Brilliant
Ok, so it seems Nokia viNe gave up on me when I changed at Teddington - 2nd part of journey now here: http://tinyurl.com/a7fw8o
Essex bound... http://tinyurl.com/88puk5
RT @gerrymoth: @whatleydude was right they do made nice Nokia Earmuffs :@D http://ping.fm/3zTeC - (you know it!)
http://twitpic.com/vvb2 - Taking the Presents home to the family :)
Wondering if @ew4n will follow through on his promise of an alternative Christmas Speech on @MIReview tomorrow...
